regen.absent_element: action to handle errors when updating database of torrent sites via the internet
regen.new_specification: The system shall display an error message if there is a failure in updating the database of torrent sites via the internet.

regen.absent_element: specification for handling errors when updating torrent sites database via the internet
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and display error messages when the update of the torrent sites database via the internet fails.

regen.absent_element: handling of invalid or empty search queries
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle invalid or empty search queries by displaying an error message or prompting the user to enter a valid query.

label: If no results are found on a search it will display a message that No results were found for this search.
absence: situation of no results were found
